name: web-starter
description: My organization for web developpement with React and Webpack.

scripts.start: npm run clean && webpack-dev-server --progress --hot --config config/webpack.config.js --content-base build && open http://localhost:8080/webpack-dev-server/
scripts.build: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production webpack -p --config config/webpack.production.config.js

author: Jérémie Boulay <jeremi.boulay@gmail.com>
